Author: GitHub
Description:
Before creating TypeScript, C#, or Turbo Pascal, Anders Hejlsberg was just a high school student building his own kit computer in the late 70s. In this clip, he shares how he fell in love with programming on 8-bit micros and the unique challenge of fitting code into just 64K of memory.

#AndersHejlsberg #TypeScript #TurboPascal

Title: How Anders Hejlsberg learned to code in the 70s
